snippet.title: SteamWorld Dig - HD Trailer
snippet.description:
SteamWorld Dig - a platform mining adventure game. Available on 3DS, Steam (PC, Mac, Linux), PlayStation 4/Vita, Xbox One and Wii U.

Official website: imageform.se/game/steamworld-dig/

Reviews:
10/10 - PocketGamer: http://www.pocketgamer.co.uk/r/3DS/SteamWorld+Dig/review.asp?c=52943
9.5/10 - IGN: http://www.ign.com/articles/2013/09/18/steamworld-dig-a-fistful-of-dirt-review
9/10 - NWR: https://www.nintendoworldreport.com/review/35146
8/10 - NintendoLife: http://www.nintendolife.com/reviews/3ds-eshop/steamworld_dig
